MUSIC.TITLE: NTU CSIE B94 Graduation Song
MUSIC.DESC: This was a song I wrote with some other students for all undergraduate in NTU CSIE as a graduation gift.

MUSIC.TITLE: Embracing Calla Lily
MUSIC.DESC: This song was written to join the "Calla Lily Festival" theme music competition. It is one of my favorite songs I've written.

MUSIC.TITLE: What Happened?
MUSIC.DESC: I wrote this song to express a considerate mind toward friends who were in bad moods.
